content: block-a-week-cal arctic and happy dreams square copyright ineke mooijenkind © 2019 all rights reserved this is one square of my arctic and happy dreams collection the photo tutorial is made with the arctic square but you can also make it in the happy dreams colourway listed finished size will be 10 inches/ 25 4 cm if made with stylecraft special dk and hook size 4mm / g yarn amount approx 147 5 m/ 161 yards the arctic colours are white sherbet and teal the happy colours emperor bright green empire jaffa wisteria sunshine and bright pink every round has the colours listed as either a1-3 for the arctic square or h1-7 for the happy square arctic colours happy colours a1 = white h1 = emperor a2 = sherbet h2 = bright green a3 = teal h3 = empire h4 = jaffa h5 = wisteria h6 = sunshine h7 = bright pink happy hooking 1 original design by ineke mooijenkind copyright © 2019 all rights reserved special stitches videos made by helen of crystals and crochet bead stitch double_crochet in st/space working around the post yo and pull up a loop 3 times yo and pull through all 7 loops on hook to make a beginning bead stitch chain 3 or make a standing double_crochet and continue as normal video bead stitch folding single_crochet insert hook into back loop of next treble_crochet and into back loop of corresponding st in previous round yo and pull through 2 loops twice video folding single_crochet stitch the square starts with a magic_ring if you are not familiar with it watch this video magic_ring for a neater look also start each round with a standing stitch and end it with an invisible join video standing stitches video invisible join repeat instructions between parentheses the amount of times specified this is a lower level repeat p is the reference to photos with the relevant photo number * * repeat instructions between asterisks the amount of times specified this is normally a repeat for a complete side and will consist of multiple instructions hints will be typed in blue abbreviations st sts stitch stitches bl back loop chain chain fl front loop single_crochet single_crochet bp back post half_double_crochet half_double_crochet sl-st slip_stitch double_crochet double_crochet dtr treble_crochet fsc folding single_crochet r round fhdc folding half_double_crochet yo yarn over fdc folding double_crochet space sps space spaces treble_crochet treble_crochet 2 original design by ineke mooijenkind copyright © 2019 all rights reserved 1 a1/h1 start with a magic_ring ch1 and make 8 single_crochet in ring join to first single_crochet with a sl-st do not fasten_off stitch count 8 single_crochet 2 chain 3 counts as double_crochet double_crochet in the same st 2 double_crochet in next st 7 times join to top of chain 3 fasten_off and secure ends stitch count 16 double_crochet 3 a2/h2 hint you will have 1 double_crochet on each side of the bead stitch join with a standing double_crochet in any st in the same st bead
